location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Orton, Assistant Surgeon in Charge of the Bushire Residency, to Mr Arratoon and Mr Arrakeel Constantine

mods.abstract: Letter states that Captain Hicks's ship, Union,is ready for sea. James Orton requests that any legal documents supporting the addressees' claims against Captain Hicks must be produced immediately, otherwise Orton will not be able to detain the ship.
